Package com.ae2dms.UI.Game

Class GameViewController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.UI.AbstractBarController
com.ae2dms.UI.Game.GameViewController
public class GameViewController
extends AbstractBarController
The Controller of GameView in MVC pattern.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void checkIsGameComplete()
    Check if this Game is complete if so, pop up the GameCompletePopUp with steps and time duration, with text field where user can type in names to save record
    private void checkIsLevelComplete()
    Check if this level is complete if so, pop up the LevelCompletePopUp with steps and time duration
    private void clickSaveGame()
    click save game button
    private void clickToMenu()
    click back to menu button will pop up a alert where you can save your game with advice
    private void clickUndo()
    click undo button
    private void exitGaussianBlur()
    exit the state where game view is in Gaussian Blur
    private void gaussianBlur()
    enter the state where game view is in Gaussian Blur
    void handleKey​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
    handle the key event in the game view like the WSAD, Up Down Left and Right
    void initialize()
    Initialize the GameView and Controller set the background image to a random one bind the level index, level count, steps and time count with the one in GameDocument render the game map with the map in GameDocument
    private void switchToNextLevel()
    Change to the next level, if no more level, then call checkIsGameComplete()

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize the GameView and Controller set the background image to a random one bind the level index, level count, steps and time count with the one in GameDocument render the game map with the map in GameDocument
